Package bRigid

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BBox
    Box as rigidBody
    BCompound
    CollisionShape as Compound of multiple shapes.
    BConvexHull
    ConvexHull as rigidBody, List of vertices, PShapes or .obj files as input and calculates its convexHull for collisionDetection
    BForce
    linear force
    BForceAttraction
    Attractor force
    BForceAttractionLocal
    attraction force for local behaviors, add on Objects
    BForceLocalSwarm  
    BGImpactMesh  
    BGImpactMeshPart  
    BJoint6DofC
    Generic6DofConstraint between two rigidbodies each with a pivot point that descibes the axis location in local space.
    BJointHinge
    Hinge constraint between two rigid bodies each with a pivot point that descibes the axis location in local space.
    BJointNail
    Point to point constraint between two rigid bodies each with a pivot point that descibes the "ballsocket" location in local space.
    BJointPoint
    Point to point constraint between two rigid bodies each with a pivot point that descibes the "ballsocket" location in local space.
    BJointSlider
    Slider constraint between two rigid bodies allows the body to rotate around one axis and translate along this axis.
    BObject
    BObject is the basic RigidBody Object, all other RigidBodies extend BObject and inherent all attributes ConstructionInfo by Richard Brauer -- http://www.r6753.com
    BPhysics
    solver class, physics world; the BPhysics class acts like a container; every rigid object or spring should be added here
    BPlane
    infinite non-moving (static) collision plane.
    BSphere
    Sphere as rigidBody
    BSpring6DofC
    Generic6DofConstraint between two rigidbodies each with a pivot point that descibes the axis location in local space.
    BSpringHinge
    Hinge constraint between two rigid bodies each with a pivot point that descibes the axis location in local space.
    BSpringNail
    Point to point constraint between two rigid bodies each with a pivot point that descibes the "ballsocket" location in local space.
    BSpringSlider
    Slider constraint between two rigid bodies allows the body to rotate around one axis and translate along this axis.
    BTerrain
    static BvhTriangleMeshShape.
